category: news
title: "Businesses could face fines in city crackdown on bias for AI hiring tools"
excerpt: "Employers will soon face stricter rules for when they can use résumé-scanning software and other automated hiring tools. The City Council's Committee on Technology on Wednesday approved a bill that would bar employers from using automated hiring tools unless the software has undergone an independent audit for racial and gender biases,"
